D

date - Variable in class ShowTime
 
dateTime - Variable in class Ticket
 
DATETIMEFORMAT - Static variable in class AdminController
The date time format used to convert date objects to and from String
director - Variable in class Movie
The title of the Movie.
displayBookingForm(int, Movie, ShowTime, String) - Method in class BookingUI
This methods prompts for information that must be collected from user prior to booking.
displayMovieDetails(Movie) - Method in class BookingUI
Displays the movie given the movie object.
displayMovieOptions(Movie) - Method in class BookingUI
Displays what the user can do with the selected Movie User can View Seat Availability, Book Movie, Add/View Review
displayMoviePriceAdjustmentForm(int) - Method in class PaymentUI
Displays form for adjusting the movie's price for weekday, weekend and holiday.
displayPaymentForm(Ticket) - Method in class PaymentUI
Calculates and displays price and ticket type
displayReview() - Method in class ReviewUI
Displays the reviews of this Movie.
displayReview(Movie) - Method in class ReviewController
Displays the reviews of the specified movie.
divider - Variable in class BookingUI
Divider for formatting output
